(Individual, operating, equipment, and share of other grants. For shared grants, indicate if you are the Principal Investigator (The Principal Investigator is the holder and signing authority of the grant account). Indicate if a grant is not being administered through the Faculty of Engineering, and, if not, state where it is being administered. Do not list internal university startup funds, AIF or other graduate scholarships listed in section 3. Also, do not list unsuccessful applications and/or grants applied for but not yet awarded. List start and finish date (e.g., NSERC (Discovery), April 2008 - March 2012).

ReportSection.name: Scholarly Publications
ReportSection.title: 5. SCHOLARLY PUBLICATIONS
ReportSection.Static: Do not include articles submitted but not yet accepted. List the most recent first, using the standard NSERC format. Use all capital letters to indicate names of students. One copy of each publication or manuscript is to be deposited with the Department Chair, including letter of acceptance for articles in press.

(a) List the publications published or accepted in refereed journals during the past year:

(specify number of pages)
